section.p: This section describes the parameters required to create an unknown subscriber template. Log into the SM GUI, navigate to Subscriber Manager > Unknown Subscriber to configure the template.

note.p: Device is mandatory and account, subscription, group, user are optional entities to configure in template.

row.entry: An unique Id for the template.

entry.p: The sub-template consists of necessary attributes to create subscriptions.

row.entry: The Bundle to associate with the template. It cannot be blank.

entry.p: Mandatory if you click ADD SUB TEMPLATES option
The account identifier to be associated with the template.

If this field is specified in the sub-template, then an account with the specified ID must exist in the system and it is used to create Subscriptions. If this value is not specified, then the account defined in the template is used.
The subscription is attached to the device.
Mandatory if you click ADD SUB TEMPLATES option
The subscription is attached to the group.
Note: Both Attach to Device and Attach to Group cannot be set to false.
Mandatory if you click ADD SUB TEMPLATES option
